raw_body: FERNANDO – ANTHONY CARL. Son of the late Felix and Etta Fernando, loving brother of Audrey and brother-in-law of the late Quintus De S. Wijeyeratne, beloved uncle of Sriyan and Geraldine, Samantha, Sanith and Ashuntha, Surein and Anushka, cherished grand uncle of Ashinsa and Nishan, Rashmi, Sahein, Chelan, Shanya and Shevin, passed away peacefully on the 18th April.
